name: tabular-playground-series-sep-2022
data_intro: For this challenge, you will be predicting a full year worth of sales for 4 items from two competing stores located in six different countries. This dataset is completely fictional, but contains many effects you see in real-world data, e.g., weekend and holiday effect, seasonality, etc. You are given the challenging task of predicting book sales during the year 2021.
